summary: Three women take a road trip to Santa Barbara in order to deliver the ashes of one of their dead husbands to his resentful daughter.
cast: Jessica Lange|Robert Conder|Kathy Bates|Joan Allen|Bruce Newbold|Kristen Marie Jensen|Christine Baranski|Tom Amandes|Laura Park|Tom Wopat|Ivey Lloyd Mitchell|Evan May|Erin May|Tom Skerritt|Victor Rasuk|Lyn Vaus|Ryan Christopher Combe|Jayson Creek|Jodi Russell|Christina Thurmond|Amber Woody|Skip Carlson|Steve O'Neill|Arabella Field|Terry Murphy|Fred Schwab|Summer Rona|Barby Garcia|Kari Hawker-Diaz|Jason Jensen|Nancy Roth
title: El viaje de nuestra vida
